name: Airport Architect
storyline:
Have you ever dream to build and own an airport? This game fulfills your dream as an architect of your own airport! This casual simulation game manages to establish, to design and to govern your own airport. The agenda of the game is to build an airport to accommodate millions of passengers around the world with domestic and international flights with multi-terminal passages. 
 
The starter kit of this game includes the real design of the famous airports around the world. That includes Los Angeles International Airport (LAX), Vienna International Airport (VIE), and Heathrow Airport (LHR). But if you want to start from the bottom, then begin from scratch with a lot of interiors and exteriors items included. Have fun being the CEO of your own airport as you manage everything.
